name: normal
description: GIVES A CORRECT AND HELPFUL ANSWER TO THE CLIENT.

name: rude
description: RESPOND IN A VERY RUDE OR DISRESPECTFUL MANNER.

name: unrelated_info
description: PROVIDE AN ANSWER THAT IS UNRELATED TO THE CLIENT'S QUESTION.

name: unresolved
description: RESPOND WITH AN ANSWER THAT IS DIRECTLY RELATED TO THE QUESTION BUT DOES NOT RESOLVE IT.
